mapper.select:
SELECT t2.product_no FROM ( SELECT t1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT lp.product_no, lp.product_price , count(lod.order_detail_no) AS order_count FROM LH_PRODUCT LP LEFT JOIN LH_ORDER_DETAIL LOD ON (lp.product_no = lod.product_no)
WHERE lp.product_category2_no = #{productCategory2No}
GROUP BY lp.product_no, lp.product_price
ORDER BY order_count DESC
ORDER BY lp.product_price DESC
ORDER BY lp.product_price
) t1 ) t2 WHERE t2.rnum >= (#{pageNum}-1)*8+1 AND t2.rnum <= #{pageNum}*8

SELECT LP.PRODUCT_NO FROM LH_PRODUCT LP ,LH_PRODUCT_CATEGORY2 LPC2 , LH_PRODUCT_CATEGORY1 LPC WHERE LP.PRODUCT_CATEGORY2_NO = LPC2.PRODUCT_CATEGORY2_NO AND LPC2.PRODUCT_CATEGORY1_NO = LPC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY1_NO AND LPC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY1_NO = #{productCategory1No}
SELECT count(DISTINCT lp.product_no) FROM LH_PRODUCT LP LEFT JOIN LH_ORDER_DETAIL LOD ON (lp.product_no = lod.product_no) WHERE lp.product_category2_no = #{productCategory2No}

SELECT LPC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY1_NAME , LPC2.PRODUCT_CATEGORY2_NAME FROM LH_PRODUCT_CATEGORY1 LPC , LH_PRODUCT_CATEGORY2 LPC2 , LH_PRODUCT LP WHERE LPC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY1_NO = LPC2.PRODUCT_CATEGORY1_NO AND LP.PRODUCT_CATEGORY2_NO = LPC2.PRODUCT_CATEGORY2_NO AND LP.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}

SELECT LPC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY1_NAME , LPC2.PRODUCT_CATEGORY2_NAME FROM LH_PRODUCT_CATEGORY1 LPC , LH_PRODUCT_CATEGORY2 LPC2 WHERE LPC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY1_NO = LPC2.PRODUCT_CATEGORY1_NO AND LPC2.PRODUCT_CATEGORY2_NO = #{productCategory2No}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LH_PRODUCT_SCRAP VALUES ( LH_PRODUCT_SCRAP_seq.nextval, #{customer_no}, #{product_no}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT LP.PRODUCT_NO, LP.PRODUCT_NAME, LP.PRODUCT_PRICE, LV.VENDOR_BRAND_NAME, T1.ranking FROM ( SELECT LPS.PRODUCT_NO , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY count(LPS.PRODUCT_SCRAP_NO) DESC) AS ranking FROM LH_PRODUCT_SCRAP LPS GROUP BY LPS.PRODUCT_NO ) T1 , LH_PRODUCT LP, LH_VENDOR LV WHERE T1.PRODUCT_NO = LP.PRODUCT_NO AND LP.VENDOR_NO = LV.VENDOR_NO AND T1.ranking BETWEEN 1 AND 30 ORDER BY T1.ranking
